Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

Lessons learned from a decade of FOSS infrastructure consulting, training and engineering

Walter Heck

This session will walk us through lessons we learned in almost a decade of running around companies of different sizes and different business models in different parts of the world.

About Speaker

Walter has been active in the Open Source speaking scene for almost a decade, and as such has spoken on many different topics in many different places. Mostly his talks are of technical nature, with a strong engineering background this makes for interesting talks.
